course.subject: ISDN
course.name: Technology Leadership and Entrepreneurship Seminar
course.description: Series of prominent issues in the areas of technology leadership and entrepreneurship, presented by students, faculty and guest speakers for discussion. Graded P or F.

reviews.author: oliverqueen
reviews.comment_content: Prof. Yee gave great talk and, as most of the TED-like lecture and conferences are made by guest, it's a great way to see different presentation skills and improve our own based on feedbacks.
reviews.comment_teaching: Great Teaching. The lecture is mostly completed with field trip and guest speakers. Prof. Yee will act as a facilitator.
reviews.comment_grading: It is a pass or fail course, only fail if you did not have enough attendance record.
reviews.comment_workload: Be sure to attend the class, some visiting tour will be arranged to places such as accelerator and incubator in Hong Kong and China.
